use std::io::Write;

#[allow(dead_code)];
fn input() {
     let mut text = String::new();
     eprint!("? ");
     std::io::stderr().flush().unwrap();
     std::io::stdin()
          .read_line(&mut text)
	  .expect(\"Cannot read line.\");
     text.trim().parse::<f64>().unwrap_or(0.);
}

fn main() {
